meanings.definition: A story or movie containing events that precede those of an existing work.
meanings.sent1: The prequel to the popular book explained how the main character's parents met.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed watching the prequel to the movie series because it provided background information.
meanings.sent3: The prequel to the play was so interesting that it made me want to watch the original story again.
meanings.sent4: Her new novel felt like a prequel to her previous bestseller, setting the stage for a whole new adventure.
meanings.sent5: The prequel to the TV show revealed secrets about the protagonist's childhood that surprised everyone.

meanings.definition: A work that presents events that precede those of an existing work.
meanings.sent1: The author decided to write a prequel to her famous novel to explore the characters' pasts.
meanings.sent2: Fans were excited to learn that a prequel to the movie would be released next year.
meanings.sent3: The prequel to the series was like a puzzle piece that completed the whole story.
meanings.sent4: The prequel to the painting showcased the artist's early influences and inspirations.
meanings.sent5: Watching the prequel to the play felt like going back in time to understand the characters better.
